text: Tim Cahill is an Australian former professional soccer player who played as a midfielder for the Australia men's national soccer team (nicknamed the "Socceroos") from 2004 until 2018. During this time he played 108 games and scored 50 goals. Cahill was well-known for his trademark goal celebration, where he ran up to the corner of the pitch and shadowboxed the corner flag.https://10daily.com.au/news/sport/a181119orz/a-tribute-to-tim-cahill- from-the-tormented-corner-flags-of-the-world-20181119 ==Goals== :Scores and results list Australia's goal tally first, score column indicates score after each Cahill goal.
